name: Horiseon
about: This is my first project in the bootcamp. It consists of making the codebase accessible and follows the standards.

name: Console Log Finances
about: This project recreates a real-world situation, It consists on analyzing the financial records of a company, using JavaScript skills.

name: Code Quiz
about: In this project I had to create a multiple-choice coding quiz that can keep track of the high scores and initials.

name: Daily Planner Calendar
about: In this project I have to create a calendar application. This application allows user's to save events for each hour of the day.

name: Weather App
about: In this project I have to create a weather dashboar application that allow users to see the weather forecast for cities of their choice. I used an API server calls open weather, with that I have access their data and functionality by making requests with spcecific parameters to a URL.

name: Calorie
about: This webpage is designed to allow the user to select a variety of cuisines such as Korean, Chinese, Japanese, etc. even to western cuisine such as American, Latin American and even European cuisines.
